title: AnimeDroid S2 - Watch all your favorite TV series S2 v2.5.1
description:
All your favorite animes on your Android device. 

Anime search and listing, episode browser, multiple links available, streaming playback, download videos and much more at your fingertips. 

Multiple providers available 
All content always available and with a variety of links 

Native player 
Play videos natively and with your favorite app, without Adobe Flash 

Manage your favorites 
Add the animes you follow in favorites to always have them at your fingertips 

Premium Info- 
● Paid Features Unlocked 
● Location permission removed 
● This app has no advertisements 

Whats New - 
- Fixed providers 
- Fixed Chromecast support 
- Fixed the detection of downloaded videos 
- Links support improvements 
- Fixed several bugs
